description: Welcome to Intelligent Singles Network (ISN), the premier in person dating event and social mixer for top 100 college graduates. Across the US, ISN hosts monthly events where educated singles come together for genuine connections. Tired of apps and online dating? Join us for an evening of possibilities with highly educated alumni. Say goodbye to swiping and ghosting - ISN events are designed to spark meaningful conversations and lasting relationships.Are you a versatile marketer with a talent for forging partnerships, executing advertising campaigns, and creating engaging social media content? Are you passionate about making connections and driving brand engagement? Intelligent Singles is seeking a dynamic Marketing Consultant to join our team and lead our outreach, advertising, and social media efforts.Position: Marketing ConsultantExperience Required: 3-4 years of experience in marketing, with expertise in partnership development, social media management, advertising, and content creation. Proficiency in using Meta Business Manager for managing advertising campaigns on Facebook, Instagram, and other social media platforms. Experience in boosting and promoting social media posts to maximize reach and engagement. Demonstrated success in managing social media profiles and content to drive brand awareness and audience engagement. Experience in the events space, particularly in dating events or networking, is preferred but not required.Responsibilities: Develop and execute outreach strategies to establish partnerships with companies, organizations, and alumni associations, promoting ISN's events and services. Cultivate relationships with alumni associations at targeted colleges and universities, proposing partnerships to disseminate information about ISN's offerings to their alumni networks. Coordinate with the marketing team to create and implement targeted advertising campaigns on social media platforms, including Facebook, TikTok, and Instagram, using Meta Business Manager to optimize performance. Manage and update ISN's social media channels with engaging content that drives brand awareness and fosters community engagement, while boosting and promoting posts as necessary. Consult on content creation strategies to develop compelling social media content that resonates with our audience and drives engagement, including brainstorming ideas, creating content calendars, and analyzing performance metrics. Track and analyze outreach efforts, advertising campaigns, and social media performance using Meta Business Manager to measure effectiveness and identify areas for optimization.Attend select events in NY and/or MIami as needed to support efforts on the ground.Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field. Proven experience in partnership development, outreach, social media management, advertising, and content creation. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively convey value propositions and build relationships with diverse stakeholders. Creative thinker with a passion for developing engaging social media content and driving brand engagement. Enthusiasm for the dating and relationship industry, with a keen understanding of social media trends and audience preferences.Benefits: Competitive consulting fees based on experience and project scope.Work remotelyCollaborate with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth of a fast-paced startup.Join us as a Marketing Consultant at Intelligent Singles and play a pivotal role in expanding our reach and impact through strategic partnerships with venues and alumni networks, targeted advertising, and engaging social media content. To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience and interest in the position to [email address].Intelligent Singles is committed to diversity and inclusivity and encourages consultants from all backgrounds to apply. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!
